sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
    .block.text
        p Praesent sit amet aliquam nisl. Nullam suscipit euismod tellus, ut condimentum nisl. Interdum et malesuada fames ac ante ipsum primis in faucibus. Vestibulum elementum urna non justo semper, id tempus enim commodo. Duis tristique quam et aliquam egestas. Suspendisse vestibulum lacus quis risus suscipit sagittis eget id sem. Ut odio nibh, maximus at ex vel, elementum gravida orci.
</template>

<script>
    export default {
        name: 'BlockText',
        data: function(){
            return {}
        },
    }
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
    .block {
        max-width: 676px;
        margin-bottom: 50px;

        p {
            font-family: 'Roboto-Regular';
            font-style: normal;
            font-weight: 300;
            font-size: 15px;
            line-height: 25px;
            color: #37393E;
            opacity: 0.7;
            margin-bottom: 50px;
            letter-spacing: -0.1px;
        }
    }

    @media (max-width: 1200px) {
        .block {
            max-width: 600px;
        }
    }

    @media (max-width: 960px) {
        .block {
            max-width: 100%;

            p {
                margin-bottom: 40px;
            }
        }
    }

    @media (max-width: 640px) {
        .block {
            margin-bottom: 31px;

            p {
                letter-spacing: 0.6px;
                margin-bottom: 40px;
            }
        }
    }
</style>
